response.content:
Hi Santosh,

The course was released in 2013 and that time Visual Studio 2010 was in. Now the course is about JavaScript not about Visual Studio 2010. The concepts covered in the course are still relevant and covers both javascript and jquery in depth very well

results.content:
The course materials are poorly labelled in conjunction with the training sections and inner modules, I need to really focus just to understand what the tutor is saying and the course has been rather slow if I am expected to just to watch which this would imply, however, if not, and I am supposed to be scripting along with the tutor which based on the course materials would again imply not to script along with him, then this would be to fast.
Also your feedback form popup with the star rating is buggy, using Chrome I could select the stars but to enter my comment I needed to type this in notepad and copy into the message field. The message box would not let me type as it was still trying to select the stars even after multiple clicks to select the stars.
results.content_html:
The course materials are poorly labelled in conjunction with the training sections and inner modules, I need to really focus just to understand what the tutor is saying and the course has been rather slow if I am expected to just to watch which this would imply, however, if not, and I am supposed to be scripting along with the tutor which based on the course materials would again imply not to script along with him, then this would be to fast.
Also your feedback form popup with the star rating is buggy, using Chrome I could select the stars but to enter my comment I needed to type this in notepad and copy into the message field. The message box would not let me type as it was still trying to select the stars even after multiple clicks to select the stars.
